abstract: Comments suggest that Motorola may stand up to Carl C. Icahn as he presses the chief executive to use $11.2 billion in cash to buy back stock and reward investors.
snippet: Comments suggest that Motorola may stand up to Carl C. Icahn as he presses the chief executive to use $11.2 billion in cash to buy back stock and reward investors.
lead_paragraph: Motorola may be preparing for a fight to keep the billionaire activist Carl C. Icahn off its board.

headline.main: Motorola May Fight to Keep Icahn Off Board
headline.print_headline: Motorola May Fight to Keep Icahn Off Board
